## Summary

A one-paragraph description of the feature.

## Motivation

Why is this feature needed? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed Design

Describe how you envision the feature working. Include SQL syntax, API shape, or behavior examples.

## Alternatives Considered

Other approaches you considered and why you prefer this one.

## Additional Context

Links to relevant SQL standards, research papers, or other databases that implement this feature.
